author: arxis75
content:
Considering the last DiscV5 AES_GCM encryption/decryption test, the use of the following tool shows that the MAC/Tag is postpended to the ciphertext:
https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=AES_Encrypt(%7B'option':'Hex','string':'0x9f2d77db7004bf8a1a85107ac686990b'%7D,%7B'option':'Hex','string':'0x27b5af763c446acd2749fe8e'%7D,'GCM','Hex','Hex',%7B'option':'Hex','string':'0x93a7400fa0d6a694ebc24d5cf570f65d04215b6ac00757875e3f3a5f42107903'%7D)&input=MHgwMWMyMDEwMQ
